verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> called<WH7121> to Moses,<WH4872> and spoke<WH1696> to him out of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> saying,<WH559>

Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, If<WH3588> any man<WH120> of you bring<WH7126> an offering<WH7133> to the LORD,<WH3068> you shall bring<WH7126> your offering<WH7133> of the cattle,<WH929> even of the herd,<WH1241> and of the flock.<WH6629>

If<WH518> his offering<WH7133> be a burnt<WH5930> sacrifice of the herd,<WH1241> let him offer<WH7126> a male<WH2145> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549> he shall offer<WH7126> it of his own voluntary<WH7522> will<WH7522> at<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
And he shall put<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the burnt<WH5930> offering; and it shall be accepted<WH7521> for him to make atonement<WH3722> for him.

And he shall kill<WH7819> the bullock<WH1121> <WH1241> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> and the priests,<WH3548> Aaron's<WH175> sons,<WH1121> shall bring<WH7126> the blood,<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> round<WH5439> about on the altar<WH4196> that is by the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>
And he shall flay<WH6584> the burnt<WH5930> offering, and cut<WH5408> it into his pieces.<WH5409>
And the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> shall put<WH5414> fire<WH784> on the altar,<WH4196> and lay the wood<WH6086> in order<WH6186> on the fire:<WH784>

And the priests,<WH3548> Aaron's<WH175> sons,<WH1121> shall lay the parts,<WH5409> the head,<WH7218> and the fat,<WH6309> in order<WH6186> on the wood<WH6086> that is on<WH5921> the fire<WH784> which<WH834> is on the altar:<WH4196>

But his inwards<WH7130> and his legs<WH3767> shall he wash<WH7364> in water:<WH4325> and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> all<WH3605> on the altar,<WH4196> to be a burnt<WH5930> sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD.<WH3068>

And if<WH518> his offering<WH7133> be of the flocks,<WH6629> namely, of the sheep,<WH3775> or<WH176> of the goats,<WH5795> for a burnt<WH5930> sacrifice; he shall bring<WH7126> it a male<WH2145> without<WH8549> blemish.<WH8549>

And he shall kill<WH7819> it on<WH5921> the side<WH3409> of the altar<WH4196> northward<WH6828> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> and the priests,<WH3548> Aaron's<WH175> sons,<WH1121> shall sprinkle<WH2236> his blood<WH1818> round<WH5439> about on the altar.<WH4196>

And he shall cut<WH5408> it into his pieces,<WH5409> with his head<WH7218> and his fat:<WH6309> and the priest<WH3548> shall lay them in order<WH6186> on<WH5921> the wood<WH6086> that is on<WH5921> the fire<WH784> which<WH834> is on the altar:<WH4196>

But he shall wash<WH7364> the inwards<WH7130> and the legs<WH3767> with water:<WH4325> and the priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH7126> it all,<WH3605> and burn<WH6999> it on the altar:<WH4196> it is a burnt<WH5930> sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD.<WH3068>

And if<WH518> the burnt<WH5930> sacrifice for his offering<WH7133> to the LORD<WH3068> be of fowls,<WH5775> then he shall bring<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> of turtledoves,<WH8449> or<WH176> of young<WH1121> pigeons.<WH3123>

And the priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH7126> it to the altar,<WH4196> and wring<WH4454> off his head,<WH7218> and burn<WH6999> it on<WH5921> the altar;<WH4196> and the blood<WH1818> thereof shall be wrung<WH4680> out at<WH5921> the side<WH7023> of the altar:<WH4196>

And he shall pluck<WH5493> away his crop<WH4760> with his feathers,<WH5133> and cast<WH7993> it beside<WH681> the altar<WH4196> on<WH5921> the east<WH6924> part, by the place<WH4725> of the ashes:<WH1880>

And he shall split<WH8156> it with the wings<WH3671> thereof, but shall not divide<WH914> it asunder: and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar,<WH4196> on the wood<WH6086> that is on the fire:<WH784> it is a burnt<WH5930> sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD.<WH3068>
